personal_info.name: Mohamed Rashad
personal_info.title: Flutter Developer | Cross-Platform Mobile Applications
personal_info.about_me: A Flutter Developer with +2 years of experience building high-performance cross-platform mobile applications. Profi cient in state management, Firebase integration, and applying clean architecture principles. Committed to delivering intuitive user experiences and collaborating effectively to achieve project goals.

soft_skills: Collaborative team player with strong communication skills
Efficient in time management and task prioritization
Analytical thinker with solid problem-solving abilities
Adaptable to new technologies and frameworks
Proactive in identifying and resolving issues
Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality code

experience.title: Remote Flutter Developer
description_points: Contributed to the development of Imtyaze, an educational platform for online learning.
Focused on Clean Architecture, Riverpod for state management, and API integration.
Enhanced UI/UX for a seamless and engaging user experience.

experience.title: Summer Trainee
description_points: Completed intensive training in software development and mobile application design.
Collaborated with a team to implement an educational Flutter application Sm3ly.
Focused on MVVM architecture, Firebase integration, and user management with Firebase Authentication.

projects.name: Imtyaze
projects.short_description: A comprehensive e-learning platform tailored for students from high school to university.
projects.description: A comprehensive e-learning platform tailored for students ranging from high school to university. The app offers high-quality video courses, secure authentication, advanced video streaming with progress tracking, structured course enrollment, exams & assessments, transaction management, and favorites & personalization. It ensures a smooth and engaging user experience through clean UI, smooth transitions, and offline-ready features. Users can browse content, continue watching, take quizzes, and track their performance.
features: Advanced video streaming with progress tracking

projects.name: Tadabar
projects.short_description: A cross-platform Islamic application available on Google Play, integrating multiple Islamic services.
projects.description: A cross-platform Islamic application available on Google Play, featuring Quran Recitation, Hadith Collections, Azkar, Qibla Direction, Zakat Calculator, and a custom-built Islamic Chatbot. Built with a focus on performance and user-friendly design, it integrates multiple Islamic services in one place, with smooth navigation and an  elegant UI. Supports Light & Dark Mode.

projects.name: Kidglish
projects.short_description: A dynamic educational mobile app teaching English to children interactively.
projects.description: A dynamic educational mobile app designed to teach English to children interactively. The app leverages speech recognition and text-to-speech technologies to help kids practice pronunciation and improve their language skills in a fun and engaging way. Features include interactive speech-to-text exercises, clear and friendly text-to-speech voice output, drawing and signature capture for handwriting practice, animated visuals with Lottie for enhanced engagement, access to learning materials stored and synced via Firebase, and AI-powered generative features to support adaptive learning. The app prioritizes user-friendly navigation, responsive UI, and real-time feedback to create a rich learning environment for young learners.
features: Clear and friendly text-to-speech voice output
Drawing and signature capture for handwriting practice
Animated visuals with Lottie for enhanced engagement
Access to learning materials stored and synced via Firebase
AI-powered generative features to support adaptive learning

projects.name: Bank Dash
projects.short_description: A modern banking application built with Flutter that provides a complete financial management solution.
projects.description: Bank Dash is a modern banking application built with Flutter that provides a complete financial management solution. It offers features like: account overview, transaction history, money transfers, bill payments, and financial analytics, with responsive designs for both mobile and desktop platforms.
